actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the importation of fresh strawberries into the United States during certain periods of the year.

summary.text: Prohibits the importation of fresh strawberries into the United States during the period beginning on February 15 and ending at the close of April 1 during any calendar year after 1975. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture after calendar year 1975 to establish a 60-day period during which fresh strawberries may not be imported into the United States. Specifies that such 60-day period shall coincide with the maturity of the domestic strawberry crop.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the importation of fresh strawberries into the United States during certain periods of the year.
